dcterms:description: A dataset containing image-caption pairs used for training and evaluating image captioning models, known for its standard-format captions that describe salient parts of images.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:description: A dataset that improves large multi-modal models by providing better captions, focusing on generating high-quality captions for images.
dcterms:title: ShareGPT4V

dcterms:description: A dataset that leverages large language models to create enriched fused image captions, enhancing the descriptive quality of captions.
dcterms:title: FuseCap

dcterms:description: A dataset that rethinks image-text data at scale, focusing on improving the quality and relevance of image captions.
